mapper.update:
update t_rj_app_version
I_AppId = #{iAppid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
C_Version = #{cVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_VersionRemark = #{cVersionremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
I_IsCompel = #{iIscompel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
C_DownUrl = #{cDownurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_ReleaseTime = #{tReleasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T_CTime = #{tCtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
I_CUserId = #{iCuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T_RTime = #{tRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
I_RUserId = #{iRuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
C_Remark = #{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
I_Status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
C_VersionCode = #{cVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
I_IsReview = #{isReview,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where I_VersionId = #{iVersionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_rj_app_version set I_AppId = #{iAppid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, C_Version = #{cVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_VersionRemark = #{cVersionremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, I_IsCompel = #{iIscompel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_DownUrl = #{cDownurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T_ReleaseTime = #{tReleasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T_CTime = #{tCtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, I_CUserId = #{iCuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T_RTime = #{tRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, I_RUserId = #{iRuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, C_Remark = #{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, I_Status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}ï¼Œ C_VersionCode = #{cVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, I_IsReview = #{isReview,jdbcType=TINYINT} where I_VersionId = #{iVersionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: b.I_VersionId, b.I_AppId, b.C_Version, b.C_VersionRemark, b.I_IsCompel, b.C_DownUrl, b.T_ReleaseTime, b.T_CTime, b.I_CUserId, b.T_RTime, b.I_RUserId, b.C_Remark, b.I_Status,b.C_VersionCode,b.I_IsReview

a.I_VersionId, a.I_appId, a.C_Version, a.C_VersionRemark, a.I_IsCompel, a.C_DownUrl, a.T_ReleaseTime, a.T_CTime, a.I_CUserId, a.T_RTime, a.I_RUserId, a.C_Remark, a.I_Status,a.C_VersionCode,a.I_IsReview
mapper.select:
select
,IF( IFNULL(a.c_versioncode,"")>=IFNULL(b.c_versioncode,"") ,1,0) isNew ,IF(IFNULL(a.c_versioncode,"")>=IFNULL(b.c_versioncode,"") ,NULL,b.I_VersionId) newVersionId from t_rj_app_version a left join ( select b2.I_AppId,b2.c_versioncode,b2.I_VersionId from t_rj_app b1,t_rj_app_version b2 where b1.I_AppId=b2.I_AppId and b1.I_VersionId=b2.I_VersionId and b1.I_AppId=#{appId} )b on a.I_AppId=b.I_AppId where 1=1 AND a.I_AppId= #{appId} and a.C_VersionCode=#{versionCode}
